comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Another Bain Collection photo of Pope Benedict XV: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6288471009/]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: @ J_C Curtet: How do you know hat Felici took this photograph? I do see that the Felici family appears to have been the official papal photographer for over a century. www.fotografiafelici.com/index.php?page=ING/storia&la...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045433/1914-11-08/ed-... has picture in same clothes and same location. But that doesn't mean at the same time, of course. Washington Herald, October 25, 1914, Page 3, Image 9 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045433/1914-10-25/ed-... indicates that the same photo as the link above is the "first official photo of his holiness."

comment.author: 18643384@N08
comment._content: On trouve encore assez facilement ces photos publiées à l'époque (cartes postales, etc.), et elles portent la mention «Felici Roma» parfois accompagnée de «AN Paris»

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: @ J_C Curtet: Thanks. My attempts had found similar photos but not this one. But here it is: www.ebay.it/itm/PAPI-PAPA-BENEDETTO-XV-03-GENOVA-PEGLI-BO... at least for now.
